raw_comment:
I notice that the electricity has been increasing in clean energy. With China making more energy than the U.S, India makes less than both the U.S and China. 
I wonder what are the rising factors that are causing for Chinas increase and Indias decrease. 
This relates because it still demonstrates that their is electricity that produces bad energy which affects the lives of people their bodies. 
World Countries And Their Energy Production
ace_sentences: The amount of electricity from clean energy has increased.
China produces more energy than the United States.
India produces less energy than the United States.
India produces less energy than China.
I wonder what factors cause the increase in energy production in China.
I wonder what factors cause the decrease in energy production in India.
Some electricity production uses bad energy.
Bad energy affects the lives of people.
Bad energy affects the bodies of people.
The headline is: World Countries And Their Energy Production.
